properties.name: weather.refresh_cron
properties.description: Cron format for how often to query the weather API

properties.name: weather.api_key
properties.description: API Key to query the weather API, should be provided as an environment variable

properties.name: weather.units
properties.description: Wether to ask for metric or imperial measurements <'metric'|'imperial'>

properties.name: weather.http_timeout_s
properties.description: Timeout for HTTP request in seconds
